Text:
Without hesitation, Rose runs ahead with Cid following
behind her.

When the two arrive at the center of the uproar,
they find Claire surrounded by men.

Wow...! Isn't it cowardly to call your friends over
the moment you realize you're at a disadvantage?
Heh. Nothin' you say matters!
(Claire is surrounded by brutish thugs!)
Hey, sis!

(Cid is also worried about Claire.
That's understandable.)

Don't worry, Cid. I will rescue her and get her
out safely!

Huh...? Actually, I think my sis will go too far and
beat the crap out of them—

Right, little lady. Time for ya to pay for what ya
done to my pal.

I dunno if yer some kinda knight's apprentice,
but yer gonna regret being so arrogant.
Lowlifes, the lot of you...
Lemme see how tough ya get with that little stick!
Now hold on one moment!!
Wh-What?

One woman against all of you men... You should be
absolutely ashamed of yourselves.
Huh? Princess Rose?!
You brat... Get lost!
Ahh!
Aghhh—
Damn it! Come on then!
Whoa!
Rose! Use this!

Claire breaks her stick in half and tosses one through
the air.
Rose catches it without hesitation.

Thank you! A sword in this situation would be
overdoing it!
Right. Let's get this started!
Who do ya think yer messin' with!
Superb. But now it's my turn!
Aaaghhh!
They were all bark.

Yes. Considering how they boasted, their swordmanship
was absolutely sloppy.

If you don't study more, beating us will only ever be
a dream, you know.
Who the hell are youse?!
I am terribly sorry. We didn't introduce ourselves.
Yeah, I think my introduction was also incomplete.
So let's get to formalities...

I am a princess of the Kingdom of Oriana.
Rose Oriana, at your service.

I am a candidate for the Crimson Order, Claire
Kagenou. You don't need to remember my name.
A-A princess of Oriana?!
And th-that one is gonna be in Crimson Order!
Damnit! We can't take them on! Let's get outta here!
Yikes!
...Huh. That ended quickly.
Are you okay, Claire? If I had noticed sooner...
... No. You helped me. Um...thank you.

But you caught me off guard the way you suddenly
jumped in there...!

As a person in a position of power, it was naturally
my duty. But I think...if our roles had been
reversed, you would have done the same.
Anyway, I am very relieved that you didn't get hurt.

That's my line...your Highness. If you had gotten
injured, I would have been a disgrace to the
Crimson Order.

But...you can definitely fight. You're strong,
Princess.
You too, Claire!
Heheh...!
Heehee...!

Anyway, now that things have settled down,
time to buy some lemonade...
...Speaking of which, the lemonade stand is gone?!

It is gone...maybe they got scared of the uproar
and made their escape when no one was looking.
No...! That means I can't get lemonade for Cid!

...Claire, why don't we split up and check the
other stalls?
Cid asked for lemonade. There is no way we can give up!

You're right. I agree. Then I'll start looking from
over there...
Wow!
C-Cid...!
Cid...! Wh-What's that in your hands...?
You have...lemonade?

While you guys were in that brawl, I saw the lemonade
stand owner making an exit.

I guessed that you were both working up a thirst,
so I looked for another stall to buy some.
Wow! You are so kind!
Argh! Cid, that's exactly how to get on my nerves!

Nah, it's not like that. You know I would be useless
in a fight with thugs. But this is something that I
can manage.
Your thoughtfulness really pleases me.
Yeah, me too, Cid.
...Huh? You're both getting along all of a sudden...
Well, maybe because we fought back to back...?

Yes. We may have our disagreements, but we can
communicate when we fight together.
I...see? I don't really get it though...

Anyway, here you are. They were nearly all sold out,
so I could only buy two. You two can have them.
Just for...
...the two of us.

In that instant, Claire and Rose lock eyes,
sending sparks flying.
Rose, you drink that one. As for this one...
While she speaks, Claire takes one of the lemonades.
Me and Cid, we'll drink this one, together!
Whaaa?!
(Th-That is...misdirection...?!)

I cannot do that. I think you must be so very
thirsty, so...
Rose takes one of the lemonades.

Cid and I will drink from this cup, just the two of
us, okay?
Huh? As his sister, that would be unforgivable!

If you must say that, then I, as student president,
find you two sharing a cup to be unforgivable.
That has no connection to this!

Just because you are siblings does not mean you can
just do whatever you like!
Here we go again...

Somehow...there is something actually very similar
about these two.
Cid! Who do you want to drink with?!
Say it clearly!
Errrrrrrrrmm...

...Until the very end, Cid finds himself being swung
around by Rose and Claire like a planet orbited by
two very angry moons.
